ygData.subject: Hello all
ygData.msgSnippet: Just wanted to say hello to everyone. I just joined up here and wanted to give some information. My nameis Owen DuBose and I m a relatively new player to EQ
ygData.messageBody:
Just wanted to say hello to everyone. I just joined up here and
wanted to give some information.

My nameis Owen DuBose and I'm a relatively new player to EQ but a
lifelong sci-fi, fantasy and RPG fan. My partner Dan Watson and I
both play EQ on the Brell Serilis server and are looking for other
gay/lesbian friends to meet on our server.

My primary character is an Ogre ShadowKnight named Grackk, level 12,
currently sittinga round Neriak (a/k/a Scrunchyville) trying to level
up fletching, smithing and brewing skills while taking side trips to
Lavastorm to kill drakes and rock dervishes :)

My secondary character is a Human Cleric named Dhalgren who is
currentl hanging in N. Qeynos taking trips to Blackburrow to harass
some the gnolls. He is 6th level.

Dan's primary character is a 13th lvl DE Necro named Staben who is, I
believe currently blitzing around E Commons/N ro/ S Ro and Oasis.

Dan has a secondary character he hasn't even played yet, lol.

We are very interested in the possibilty of being a part of a g/l
guild on Brell or starting one if there isn't one. We are also
interested in locating other "bear" and "big bear" buddies on Brell
to group with or talk to.

Feel free to to email me at bigbear@...!

Thanks

Owen
